website_summaries.verdict: A solid option for customers seeking a party-sized pack to show off at their next gathering.
pros: This all-inclusive pack comes with 12 bottles, 12 funnels, and 12 shaping straws
Unlike other sand art kits, this model supplies buyers with 48 bags of sand for incredible creativity
cons: Sand cannot fill each bottle too full, making the bottle creations easy to mess up at the slightest shake

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, but not enough sand for each bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The package comes with 12 separate kits each with a plastic bottle, funnel, and three bags of sand. The kids had fun with this, but there was not enough sand in the kit to fill the bottle. We used a whole sand packet from another kit, and the bottle still was not completely full. When there's air in the top of the bottle and the bottle gets shaken, the sand will all mix and not have a design. There really should be 5 packets of sand in each kit to fully fill each bottle. Ultimately, it's just for fun, and was not that expensive, thus the three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They were a big hit at my daughter's party but ...
customer_reviews.text: They were a big hit at my daughter's party but the packs didn't come with enough sand to fill the entire bottle. I would say they were about 70% full when done so then when the girls walked around with them, there wasn't enough pressure to keep them from mixing up.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This sand art kit is perfect!! I knew from the reviews and pictures that the sand wasn't going to go all the way to the top but that's exactly what I was looking for. I wanted to fill up the empty space with seashells. The kids loved it, the colors are cute, the bottles are plastic so they are safe for the kids. Would purchase again for another fun art time!
customer_reviews.author: MLO

customer_reviews.title: Great for goody bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my 6yo son birthday party, to use as party favor. During the party the kids used sand bottles from another kit (with bigger bottles and more sand), but I borrowed the funnels from this set so that all the guests had their own funnel. I than collected the funnels, and put them, together with the sand bags and bottles from this kit, into guests goody bags. This was a great success. An excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome individual sand art kits!
customer_reviews.text: These sand art kits are awesome!! WAY better than I was expecting. They come with 12 individual kits. Each kit contains a bottle, plenty of sand in several colors, a funnel and tools to make designs. We used them for a party and all the kids had a great time. The kits made it SO easy because everybody had everything they needed and there was no fighting or waiting for a tool from somebody else. I'm going to be ordering a lot more of these. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Elvira

customer_reviews.title: Fun project kit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun project for my 6-year-olds birthday party. The kids really enjoyed making these sand art bottles! I recommend hot glueing the lid on when finished. Filled with sand the bottles are heavy and pretty flimsy. Other than that, I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Lebow Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Individually well packaged
customer_reviews.text: This came very well packaged. We used at my 6 year olds birthday party and they were individually packed for each child to have their own. We set out on a couple tables outside and each child had their own bottle, sand, funnel and stick so there was no fighting at all for materials. There was plenty of sand for each bottle, not sure why others said there is not. The 4 packs of sand are more than enough to fill to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughters mermaid birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters mermaid birthday party! Only con is we ran out of sand. There isn't enough sand to fill to the top of the bottle so the sand moves and ends up getting mixed up. I suggest buying an extra bag of sand in addition to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a hit at my child’s birthday party! The kids went crazy and it was perfect that each one wrap individual and there was no sharing. I was very impressed and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my child’s end of the year school party! The kids had a blast making them. We also added some glitter and sea shells to the mix!
customer_reviews.author: bhamgirl

customer_reviews.title: These are decent, the flat area before neck can ...
customer_reviews.text: These are decent, the flat area before neck can leave wiggle room for the sand that can cause the sand to mix up if you don’t tap down and fill them all the way repetively. The kids had a blast with them. Also I had multiple extra sand colors to use with this, not sure if what was included would fill the bottles or not.
customer_reviews.author: Angel DiMaggio

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: These sand kits did not have enough sand to fill the bottle. The directions say you will have extra but it turns out there is about 1/2 inch of the bottle is not filled. I really wish these were better because I had intended to use them again but we will have to look for something different. If you already have purchased them we found out if you put a small layer of glue on the top and let it sits the sand will not shift to much.
customer_reviews.author: Camp DRIVE

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughters birthday is going to be mermaid themed and I am collecting activities related to the same. This sand art kit would be a lot of fun for the kids as well as creative and one of the take home present too.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiiii

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand included!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great and it was a great idea for a party, however the sand included for each kit was not enough to fill each bottle. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 7 year old birthday party. The kids enjoyed the craft project, the funnels and sticks were very helpful, and they liked the colors, however, there wasn’t enough sand to fill the bottle. If you buy these, get some extra sand too, or else everyone will end up with identical looking, mixed up creations the minute they bump, tip, or shake their bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: used for Halloween party at school. Kids loved it! Product was shipped on time and was excellent quality!

customer_reviews.title: Complete set. 2nd grade class loved it.
customer_reviews.text: We used these for an end of year craft for 2nd grade students. It was great having a complete set for everyone to use. It was a big hit!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the creative kids out there!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loves sand art and this offered a variety of shapes and colors. Perfect birthday gift for an 8 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: These come individually packaged and were a great activity to have at my son's birthday party for all the kids to take home. However, there is not enough sand to fill the bottles all the way to the top, so their creations get ruined at the slightest shake (or drop) of the bottle. This was quite a disappointment for some of the kiddos:(
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a class or camp group

customer_reviews.title: Fun kids party craft, but need extra sand

customer_reviews.author: Nicole Benson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my preschoolers. Wish there were more sand colors, but simple, cute, and exactly what my preschoolers needed for them to make sand art bottles.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for parties and camps.
customer_reviews.text: This kit was really great as it was packaged individually and easy to distribute amongst children. We used it for summer camp and the kids really had fun with it. Love that they came with funnels. There wasn't enough sand to fill all of them but we already had extra sand just to be able to add more colors.

customer_reviews.title: ... sand art so I just couldn't pass up the good deal. She absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves doing sand art so I just couldn't pass up the good deal.She absolutely loves it

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing, in that there wasn't enough sand to fill the bottles. This activity becomes pointless if the bottle isn't filled all the way, because the colors get mixed together. At the end, everyone ended up with bottles that were 3/4 filled with grey sand.

customer_reviews.title: Okay party craft
customer_reviews.text: Fun to make... but the colors are mixed together once the kids move their bottles around

customer_reviews.title: great price, great communication with vendor

customer_reviews.text: Used these for my children's ministry! As per other suggestions, I ordered extra sand from another vendor (Activa 10-pack scenic sand in vivid colors).

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child's birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sons "beach themed" birthday party. Comes with 12 kits. Each kit comes individually wrapped, which helped keep things organized. The kit comes with 3 colors of sand and a funnel. Just be sure to buy extra sand. 3 packs do not fill the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Would order again if delivered was guarenteed to get to my address
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bottles have dents in them and some others didn't have enough sand in them for the container. Entire package was delivered to the wrong address and i had to go on a hunt to find out where it went to.
customer_reviews.author: LThomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The sand art is exactly what I was expecting. I would get extra sand to put in the bottles so it goes right to the top of the bottle. If you don’t put in any extra, the sand will mix when you are finished.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday giveaway
customer_reviews.text: Great birthday giveaway. Kids love making this craft and parents gave me much positive feedback on it long after the birthday.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for an arts and crafts Birthday party...they were a huge hit and easy to use.

product_meta.title: Boley Colored Sand Art Kit - Includes 12 Bottles, 12 Funnels, 12 Sticks, 48 Bags of Sand - Sand Art Bottles Arts and Crafts Party Set For Kids - Great Art Set for Teachers, Birthday Parties, and More!
feature_bullets: WHAT'S INSIDE: Boley's Colored Sand Art Kit is an all inclusive set that includes 12 bottles, 12 funnels, 12 shaping straws, 12 packs of green craft sand, 12 packs of purple craft sand and 12 packs of orange craft sand and 12 packs of red craft sand. Your child will have a blast with this extremely intuitive colored sand set, simply scoop and funnel the colored sand into the jars to create colorful, exotic layers and swirls!

PERFECT EDUCATIONAL GIFT: Help your child explore their creative side with Boley's 12 Pack Sand Art Kit! This set is ideal in promoting fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and creative expression. It is also a great tool in encouraging your child to communicate through imagery. This is the perfect set for group art projects, classroom assignments or birthday parties!

CHILD FRIENDLY & ALWAYS SAFE: As a global toy company, Boley's #1 priority is child safety. All of our toys are always 100% nontoxic, 100% lead-free, and 100% free of phthalates. We adhere to US and ASTM safety standards, rigorously test our toys, and have our toys certified by independent labs for quality assurance. Boley proudly supports the standards established by ASTM, SCAN, BSCI, SMETA, Sedex, ICTI Care, and more. Please note this particular toy is designed for children ages 6 and up.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: When you purchase a toy from Boley, you purchase more than just a high-quality educational toy - you gain confidence knowing Boley will always provide you with amazing customer service. If for any reason, your purchase requires service or you have questions, you can contact Amazon directly for a replacement or refund, or contact Boley by clicking "Sold by Boley Corporation" and then clicking on the "Ask A Question" button for helpful and friendly customer service!

LOOKING FOR MORE? Boley offers a diverse variety of kids' toys on Amazon. From play kitchen sets with food, pretend play cash register sets, toy banking sets with play money, dollhouses, race cars and toy trucks, fun bath toys, construction sets, legendary dinosaur sets, and other learning lootboxes, Boley has you covered! Simply search "Boley" or click on our store name to find the hundreds of educational and action-packed toys we offer to bring life, love, and laughter to families everywhere!
